returns._0: The EIP712 type hash for the attest function.
The domain separator used in the encoding of the signatures for attest, and revoke.
The EIP712 type hash for the revoke function.
Semver contract version as a string.

getAttestTypeHash().notice: Returns the EIP712 type hash for the attest function.

getDomainSeparator().notice: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signatures for attest, and revoke.

getRevokeTypeHash().notice: Returns the EIP712 type hash for the revoke function.

increaseNonce(uint256).notice: Provides users an option to invalidate nonces by increasing their nonces to (higher) new values.

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.
